content.body:
It sounds like you’re concerned that we’re focusing overmuch on the pipe operator and thinking of the other proposals in terms of the pipe operator. 
TC39 has not only talking about the pipe operator. We focused on many other proposals in the dataflow meetings on Wednesday and Thursday meetings.
pipeline's already been saddled with that tho, since when it was first presented for stage 1 many years ago, people wanted that to kill the bind operator
